OK - This is just about how to install EMF / Eclipse,

since 

Jimm was wondering about it earlier.

I did a complete install from scratch.

Here my steps:

	Download callisto 3.2:
eclipse-SDK-3.2-linux-gtk-x86_64.tar.gz

	./eclipse

	Help > Software Updates > Find and Install > Search
for New Features to Install

	Selected Both Callisto Discovery and Eclipse Updates

	Now if you select one thing, 
	it might give you a red x at the top saying this is
also required.

	However, you can push the "Select Required" button,
	which selects the dependencies as well.

	Then when done selecting all the goodies,
	Select 
	
	Filter features included in other features on the
list

	Next ... Complete the Install
